Share: Digg Facebook StumbleUpon Abductee Jim Sparks Comments On Alien Symbol Technology © 2008 by Linda Moulton Howe “I know that flashing symbols is a method of getting information from E. T. to E. T., or E. T. to human. It’s a fast way of transmitting a tremendous amount of data, in a short time and retaining it.” - J im Sparks, Author and Abductee Click for podcast. Also see YouTube for Fox Network video of January 19, 2008, videotape by David Caron near Stephenville municipal airport. February 22, 2008 Las Vegas, Nevada - In 1995, at a conference about the human abduction syndrome, I met one of the participants named Jim Sparks, born Jim Sparacino to his Italian parents on November 15, 1954. J im Sparks, born Jim Sparacino on November 15, 1954, to Italian parents. Photograph courtesy Jim Sparks. See More Information below about Jim's work. Unlike many abductees who experience loss of consciousness and missing time, Jim’s interactions with what he calls “aliens” have been mostly conscious. Even back in 1995, Jim Sparks made a clear distinction between what he described as small, grey, drone worker types that are different from taller, “true aliens,” or supervisors. Jim explained that when he was thirty-four years old in 1988, he was happily married and had thriving real-estate work in both Texas and North Carolina. Then suddenly, beings from other worlds entered his life and he thought he was losing his mind. Jim Sparks had interactions with different types: one category was the grey-skinned, large dark eyes, that apparently come in many varieties, including small androids that do work for taller, independently intelligent, controllers.

J i m Sparks's depiction of the small, alien android entities monitoring his training in alien “classroom” where Jim was forced to learn a symbol language. Drawing by Jose Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks. Jim also had a conscious, face-to-face encounter with several tall, reptilian-skinned, humanoids. Jim says those reptilians warned that the Earth’s environment is facing a crisis and the planet must be saved, whether humans survive or not. J im Sparks's depiction of the tall, reptilian humanoids, that had gold eyes with black vertical pupils like an alligator's eyes. Drawing by Josi Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks. Y oung alligator photographed in Florida. From 1988 into the 1990s, Jim was schooled by the grey-skinned beings in front of computers and 3-dimensional projections. Jim was forced to learn the alien symbols and numbers. Eventually, Jim says he was also contacted by alleged U. S. government intelligence operatives who wanted to know about the alien symbols and numbers.

“R eal alien” supervisor that appeared with powerful presence and ordered Jim Sparks to write his question in alien symbols after Sparks argued with small, grey “drones.” Drawing by Jose Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks. Jim has always stressed that when people see aerial craft jump from one side of the sky to the other, or see entities that appear translucent and walk through solid walls, or feel a weight go down on their bed, but cannot see what’s making the weight – it’s all advanced, alien technologies. Since Jim Sparks was taken from his home by a non-human beam technology over several years and educated in front of alien computer screens to learn alien symbols and numbers, I asked him to study the Stephenville, Texas, symbols videotaped by David Caron on January 19, 2008, to see if Jim could see any meaning in the symbols. I talked with Jim this week about his impressions of the projected 3-dimensional and colorful “symbols” by the aerial disc near the Stephenville municipal airport. O ne video frame of hundreds, each 3-dimensional “symbol” segmented in colors and intricately structured. January 19, 2008, near Stephenville municipal airport by David Caron. See YouTube Fox Network video . Interview:

T w enty pages of English text retold in only tw o pages of alien symbols, further reduced to one-half page in alien shorthand and further reduced to one circle of shorthand symbols equivalent to the full 20-page English text. Drawings by Jose Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks. Jim Sparks, Author, The Keepers: An Alien Message for the Human Race © 2006, Las Ve g a s , N e va d a : “What stands out the most is that the symbols flashed, and not so much as I recognized them specifically as the symbols I’m familiar with – in some cases sort of similar. But the fact that the symbols flashed is similar to how communication takes place in the galactic neighborhood, so to speak. The technology exists to flash a symbol - say, before a human being – and at the time you might get the whole picture and understand what the symbol means, even if it is equivalent to 50 pages of English text. The symbol content could even be as much as an entire feature movie. Or a symbol will be flashed, presented before you that way, and you’ll absorb the message, but you will begin to understand it only at a later time. So that’s what stood out for me the most – the fact the symbols (in Texas) flashed that way. When I saw your short video of the symbols, I did not get the meaning at that moment, so I believe the meaning of the symbols will come later. SO, THE RAPIDITY IN THE CHANGE OF SYMBOLS IS SOMETHING YOU RECOGNIZE FROM YOUR OWN EXPERIENCE? Yes, the best way for me to explain something like that is if I mentioned a movie to you. If I were to say, for example, Gone With The Wind. Most people have seen that movie. Or if I were to say, Independence Day – your mind is capable of seeing that entire movie in a flash – the emotions behind it, what the movie was about, how it began and how it ended because you sat through an hour or two of watching it at a slow speed, which is how you were receiving the data. The mind is capable of retaining that data in a flash. Non-human intelligent beings in the so-called galactic neighborhood communicate that way. They can flash symbols and you can get the whole meaning of a 2-hour movie, or the full meaning of whatever message they were trying to get across. So, that’s something I saw that was very similar to the Texas symbols. In Texas, what I find fascinating is the way the symbols are presented. I call it ‘flashed.’ I know that flashing symbols is a method of getting information from E. T. to E. T., or E. T. to human. It’s a fast way of transmitting a tremendous amount of data in a short time and retaining it. So, I definitely see that in Texas, too. Abductees Shown “Future Images” of Environmentally Troubled Earth WE’RE SPEAKING IN FEBRUARY 2008. FROM ALL YOUR PERSONAL EXPERIENCES WITH THE NON-HUMAN INTELLIGENCES THAT YOU INTERACTED WITH, DO YOU HAVE ANY CLEAR SENSE RIGHT NOW ABOUT

WHAT MIGHT UNFOLD THIS YEAR AND INTO THE NEAR FUTURE? For myself personally, and for millions of other human abductees, we were informed about the condition of the environment. We were told there is something we need to do and we need to do it sooner than later so we don’t destroy ourselves. With humans at the helm, that’s the direction we have been going. The fact is that these E. T. technologies are not just in E. T. hands, but they are in the hands of human beings. But, of course, Black Budget and Above Top Secret classifications mean these technologies are not getting out to the public. I do know that some of the things in the government’s possession include non-polluting free energy. There is another technology that is so phenomenal that will draw matter out of water, meaning draw out pollutants. You can clean the sea pretty quickly, all the Earth’s seas. There is also technology that will take pollutants out of the atmosphere. There are technologies that exist, which can re-generate the planet’s wildlife, meaning in the rainforest vegetation and growth. There is a growing number of people in the Black Budget agencies, who want to see these E. T. technologies come out into the world and make a difference (in our survival) and so the human species can evolve, including extending life beyond your wildest dreams, or not even dying! So, according to sources, the Black Budget agencies want to see an amnesty bill or an avenue created where they can voluntarily come out, not by force and be forced to disclose everything that they have. But if an individual or group chooses to come forward with these E. T. technologies and the truth about extraterrestrial life, there could be a voluntary avenue and those individuals or agencies cannot be prosecuted. Those people are concerned about their own hides, quite frankly. That’s a big reason why some of this stuff does not come out. Let’s face it, over the past 50 to 60 years, people have been discredited for having this knowledge and trying to get it forward. People have been maimed and in some cases, people have been killed. Those are crimes against humanity. when you come forward with these kinds of E. T. technologies and the truth about extraterrestrials, in that same bag you’re going to have to come out with what we humans did to keep this stuff secret – what our government did for national security. If there is 100% amnesty, meaning the Black Budget people cannot be charged anymore for those crimes – and, of course, they could not do that anymore after amnesty were declared – I think we could really see a change on the face of the planet beyond our wildest dreams. WHY WOULD THE NON-HUMANS HAVE ALLOWED OUR GOVERNMENT AND OTHER GOVERNMENTS TO SUPPRESS ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES IN THE FIRST PLACE THAT WOULD HAVE SOLVED OUR ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS? The way I see it, and maybe others do, too. Things have happened in stages, meaning that from the 1940s to the 1950s, there were ‘flying saucers’ in those days, flying discs in the air. Good, clear black and white photographs were taken. That really cannot be denied. Also, in that day, we had nothing even close to that disc technology. So, we were paranoid, the government was paranoid. I think the biggest problem in those early years was the fact that if the E. T.s were benign, that’s good – but what if the E. T.s were doing things we did not like? There was nothing we could do about it. We had to catch up with that technology by shooting the discs down, by trying to make contact and everything we could without having the public know. But most of us were smart enough to know that these discs were certainly there in the skies. Of course, we were being told one lie after the next and I think in those early years, that was to try to catch up with the technology, to have something to respond back (militarily) if it was something our government did not like. So, they could not come out to the public and say, ‘Hey, these things exist. We don’t know what they are or where they are coming from and there is nothing we can do about it.’ And as the years went on, some of these things crashed. I think we all know the story of U. S. Army Lt. Col. Philip J. Corso [author of The Day After Roswell © 1997]. Some of the extraterrestrial technologies were placed in the hands of American industries. We formed different agencies to back-engineer crashed discs. In some cases, the government even recovered living non-human beings. And as time has gone on, I believe that contact and agreements were actually made to work side-by-side in certain areas in secret also. Now, according to the information that I have, we were warned even 50 years ago that we were on a path to create an environment that a human being could not exist in anymore.

Even if the E. T. is not so concerned about us humans, the E. T.s are especially concerned about this host planet. The E.T.s don’t want to see an environment that is nuked out (nuclear war), biologically wiped out. Or create an atmosphere where nobody can breathe anymore, a nasty place. They want this outpost to be a fresh, clean environment that they can work in. So, over the years, our government has caught up with a lot of things. Obviously there are a lot of agencies – almost any abductee can tell you they have seen paramilitary or military personnel working side-by-side with E. T. We’re getting to the point, I believe, of critical mass. Environmentally, if we don’t do something, we’re going to be in trouble here within the next ten years easily - I mean serious trouble! Playing Back Time: Past, Present and Future WHEN YOU WERE IN THE CRAFT WITH THE NON-HUMANS AND THEY WERE SHOWING YOU SYMBOLS AND THE SCREENS, DID YOU EVER SEE A 3-DIMENSIONAL IMAGE OF THE EARTH WITH THE TELEPATHIC COMMUNICATION: ‘THIS IS DEFINITELY WHAT YOUR EARTH IS GOING TO LOOK LIKE AT A SPECIFIC YEAR? In the early years of my experiences I saw that there is no doubt that the technology exists to manipulate time. To what degree? Well, that’s hard to say. I had an abduction scenario where the process took approximately two hours, but when I was brought back, I was brought back 2 to 3 minutes before I left! At first, I thought it was a mistake. But then I figured it was for me to learn something. That was phenomenal. I’ve had abduction experiences where you know in your mind it has been several hours, but when you are returned and look at the clock and it’s only been 15 minutes. And sometimes the reverse. So, I know that time can be manipulated. In those early years in almost every experience of emotional experiments or extracting semen, I would get different scenes from different time periods from around the world. Some of the scenes looked like they were way in the distant future. Some looked like they were pretty much present. Some were in the past. The scenes were never in order and were a bit disorienting when I could not put a finger on what time period it was or what the meaning was. What I’m realizing over time is, it’s like any other human being. If you give a human a peek at the future, they might do things to plan around what they’ve seen and that could be totally out of line from whatever a global agenda might be. Two Earth Futures: One Bleak; One Bright From personal experience, I saw what I perceived to be two potential futures. And it was divided like a highway as it was presented in hologram form. To the left, was a dark, dreary future that was police state in nature. Very few of us survived us. The skies were almost black, but a dark grey. Light was emanating from nowhere and yet everywhere, so it was almost as if Earth were glowing like light from the sun was being filtered and the light was being refracted so there were no shadows. The soil, the ground, had huge, thick coatings on it of this black, damp, ash-like looking material and the buildings and the structures and the things that I saw were not destroyed, but yet were coated with this ashy stuff. You could see people in this scene and they did not look uncomfortable, meaning that the few people I did see in this scene looked like they could breathe the atmosphere. But it seemed to be a very dreary place. Something that stuck out that I saw, which bothered me, was there was a community – anywhere America – and in that area was a person in uniform I did not recognize, almost like a Gestapo checkpoint person. That meant that the few people who survived in that time, when they came into the community, they were checked. So it did not look good. Now, on the bright side, on the right side of the divided highway, - and then I’ll tell you the message and you can take it for what it’s worth- it was the complete opposite, meaning that we had evolved. There was longevity beyond the point of passing away. It was bright, clear, clean. And what was scary to me, even though it was positive, was it looked like the human species had evolved to the point where they can span the Cosmos. So, there were not as many Earth-bound individuals from what I could see (not very many people). So there were two things: the line in the middle that divided the two scenes represented, in

my understanding, how close we are to go one way or the other. And what a dangerous, dangerous, dangerous day we live in! And something so simple as the flip of a coin can make the difference in which way we go. Clearly, if we go to the left to the dark and dreary, that is a path that’s not a good thing. Clearly if we go the other direction, we can actually join the galactic neighborhood. And for the first time, the human species evolves. Will Governments Tell Truth About E.T.s Before 2050? IN FEBRUARY 2008, HOW OLD ARE YOU RIGHT NOW? I’m 53-years-old. IN YOUR REMAINING LIFE TIME, HAVE YOU BEEN SHOWN IN ANY WAY THAT YOU WILL LIVE TO SEE THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES AND OTHER GOVERNMENTS TELL THE TRUTH ABOUT THE EXISTENCE OF OTHER EXTRATERRESTRIAL LIFE FORMS? I’m confident that will be revealed. I’m confident (it will happen) in my lifetime. The only scary aspect of it is: Will we take the positive route and evolve? Or by merely the flip of a coin take the negative route and not evolve? The odds are that we do not (evolve), but I think we can break that inertia because the E. T. technologies are in the hands of human beings. Not all the Black Op people are bad. I’m not saying they are great or what they are doing is right. But I think it’s sad that the government uses people instead of people using the government like it’s supposed to be. WHY DON’T THE EXTRATERRESTRIALS FORCE THE GOVERNMENTS OF THIS PLANET TO TELL THE TRUTH? They don’t operate that way. This is a very hard thing for the human species to swallow. We as a species tend to want to rely on another source to get us out of jams or to go forward. We’re all in a sense guilty of that. For example, we look to the government to pull us out. We look to God to pull us out. But by forcing a hand for the first time by looking inward and doing these things ourselves – not have E. T. over-power the governments, not have E. T. lead the way because it won’t have any meaning, it won’t have any depth. I believe, according to them, that they have force played scenarios in the last several million years and it did not work. I’ve come to believe that when the human species evolves, it’s not really going to be so concerned about non-human intelligent life. Yes, I think we will rub shoulders with them, not only on this planet but in outer space and other dimensions. In the galactic neighborhood, they are not warring. In the galactic neighborhood, technologies are so advanced, you always know if you have an enemy or competition – you always know what they are thinking. It’s a world out there that has differences, but they don’t destroy each other over the differences because the Cosmos is pretty big.” More Information:
